member.name: M:Zebble.ListView`2.Add(`0)
member.summary: Adds a new Item to the List and also adds it to the DataSource

member.name: M:Zebble.ListView`2.Remove(`0,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Removes an Items from the list and its DataSource

member.name: F:Zebble.ListView`2.LazyLoadEnded
member.summary: This event will be fired when all datasource items are rendered and added to the list.
